## grayscale variable

Returns transformation matrix which computes luminance of user color (optionally with custom coefficients). Does NOT modify alpha channel.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
grayscale: (x?: number, [r, g, b]?: number[]) => [number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number, number]
```
